## Code Review: PR #60 - Web Dashboard Shell

### Review Complete

**Files Reviewed:**
- [x] `web/src/lib/auth.ts` - Auth configuration with token refresh
- [x] `web/src/components/layout/header.tsx` - RefreshTokenError handling
- [x] `web/src/app/dashboard/layout.tsx` - Server-side auth check
- [x] `web/src/app/api/guilds/route.ts` - Guilds API route
- [x] `web/src/components/layout/server-selector.tsx` - Guild selector with abort cleanup
- [x] `web/src/lib/discord.server.ts` - Discord API utilities
- [x] `web/src/proxy.ts` - Route protection
- [x] `web/src/types/next-auth.d.ts` - Type augmentation
- [x] `web/src/components/error-card.tsx` - Error UI component
- [x] `web/src/app/dashboard/page.tsx` - Dashboard page

**CI Status:** ✅ Passing

### Summary

All previously identified issues from prior review iterations have been addressed:
- Access tokens are not exposed to the client (stay in server-side JWT)
- RefreshTokenError is properly handled with single handler to avoid race conditions
- Defense-in-depth auth check in dashboard layout
- Proper AbortController cleanup on component unmount
- Discriminated union type for bot guild API availability
- Rate limit handling with retry logic
- Comprehensive test coverage

No new issues found.

--
Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub:
https://github.com/BillChirico/bills-bot/pull/60#issuecomment-3905973261
You are receiving this because you were mentioned.

Message ID: <BillChirico/bills-bot/pull/60/c3905973261@github.com>

INSTRUCTIONS: Evaluate this email. If important (login codes, billing, payments, action required, replies to Bill, package tracking), DM Bill using: message action=send channel=discord target=user:191633014441115648 message="brief summary". If not important (marketing, newsletters, spam, test emails from himself, Google security alerts about new sign-ins/devices, GitHub PR comments/reviews/CI notifications), reply NO_REPLY. SKIP all Google Security Alert emails. SKIP all GitHub notification emails about PR comments, reviews, code review requests, CI/CD status, and issue comments. Auto-track any package tracking numbers with 17TRACK.
<<<END_EXTERNAL_UNTRUSTED_CONTENT>>>
